text: The Trinidad and Tobago men's cricket team is organised by the Trinidad and Tobago Cricket Board (TTCB). Although it is the national team of Trinidad and Tobago, it does not play international matches. The TTCB is a member of the West Indies Cricket Board (WICB), which represents several Caribbean nations in the International Cricket Council (ICC). Trinidadians play internationally for the West Indies. The team has been active since 1869. It plays its home matches at the Queen's Park Oval in Port of Spain. ==References== Category:First-class cricket teams in the West Indies Category:National sports teams of Trinidad and Tobago
title: Trinidad and Tobago men's cricket team
